text: @realDonaldTrump Over a quarter of world’s COVID-19 deaths are in USA! SHAMEFUL! This is the cost for having an incompetent & corrupt Trump in White House. Lies & Egocentricity cost lives. Our GOP senators had the chance to save lives & USA by removing him & replace him with Pence but they didn’t
